price: Enti εnyε nsεnkyerεnee mma Quraishfoᴐ no sε Israel mu nwomanimfoͻ no nim yie (sε Qur’aan ho nkͻmhyε wͻ Tawra ne Injeel no mu)?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
